name: Acekour
description:
DISCLAIMER: This page is still being built and the game is still in development!

Acekour is a fast-paced 2D sidescroller platformer.

The main goal is to reach the far right side of the level in the fastest way possible, by killing, jumping and or dodging dangers.

There are 2 sets of inputs:
Recommended:

A and D to move,
Space to jump
Left Mouse Button to Kill
Right Mouse Button to Dodge

Optional:

Left and Right Arrow to Move,
Up Arrow to Jump,
X to Kill
Z to Dodge
